meta.title: Verdict with Ted Cruz
meta.description: Join Senator Ted Cruz as he breaks down the most important news stories of the day. Listen to Verdict with Ted Cruz to go behind the scenes of the Capitol, from the President's impeachment trial to the political debates that will define our country for decades to come.
meta.subtitle: Verdict with Ted Cruz
meta.author: Ted Cruz
meta.summary: Join Senator Ted Cruz as he breaks down the most important news stories of the day. Listen to Verdict with Ted Cruz to go behind the scenes of the Capitol, from the President's impeachment trial to the political debates that will define our country for decades to come.

episodes.title: Ep. 31 - Behind the Gates with Mark Meadows
episodes.description: EXCLUSIVE: Senator Ted Cruz and Michael Knowles sit down with White House Chief of Staff Mark Meadows for his first public interview since his appointment to the position. In this extended conversation, Mr. Meadows pulls back the curtain and gives listeners a glimpse into the inner workings of the West Wing in the age of Trump. He breaks down what the administration is doing to combat leakers, enforce the rule of law, defeat social media censorship, and more.
episodes.summary: EXCLUSIVE: Senator Ted Cruz and Michael Knowles sit down with White House Chief of Staff Mark Meadows for his first public interview since his appointment to the position. In this extended conversation, Mr. Meadows pulls back the curtain and gives listeners a glimpse into the inner workings of the West Wing in the age of Trump. He breaks down what the administration is doing to combat leakers, enforce the rule of law, defeat social media censorship, and more.

episodes.title: Ep. 30 - Don’t Defund The Police
episodes.description: In a post-quarantine reunion, Senator Ted Cruz and Michael Knowles sit down together in D.C. for the first time in months to explain what defunding the police would actually mean for America, specifically for the black community, and to expose WHO’s shifting goalposts for coronavirus prevention.
episodes.summary: In a post-quarantine reunion, Senator Ted Cruz and Michael Knowles sit down together in D.C. for the first time in months to explain what defunding the police would actually mean for America, specifically for the black community, and to expose WHO’s shifting goalposts for coronavirus prevention.

episodes.title: Ep. 29 - America On Fire
episodes.description: The Senator and Michael discuss what the nationwide riots mean for justice, the shocking lie the DOJ used to target President Trump, and some good news on the horizon.
episodes.summary: The Senator and Michael discuss what the nationwide riots mean for justice, the shocking lie the DOJ used to target President Trump, and some good news on the horizon.

episodes.title: Ep. 28 - Social Media Censorship
episodes.description: The Senator and Michael discuss President Trump’s new executive order to stop social media censorship as viral videos lead to protests and looting around the country.
episodes.summary: The Senator and Michael discuss President Trump’s new executive order to stop social media censorship as viral videos lead to protests and looting around the country.

episodes.title: Ep. 27 - Civil Liberties Under Attack
episodes.description: The Senator and Michael break down the death of civil liberties in the midst of Obamagate, Mike Flynn, sexual assault on campus, and the endless lockdowns.
episodes.summary: The Senator and Michael break down the death of civil liberties in the midst of Obamagate, Mike Flynn, sexual assault on campus, and the endless lockdowns.

episodes.title: Ep. 26 - Ask Us Anything
episodes.description: The Senator and Michael take live questions from the audience, no topic off limits.
episodes.summary: The Senator and Michael take live questions from the audience, no topic off limits.

episodes.title: Ep. 25 - China Must Pay
episodes.description: The Senator and Michael discuss the concrete steps being taken to make China pay for its misdeeds and to prevent further problems in the future.
episodes.summary: The Senator and Michael discuss the concrete steps being taken to make China pay for its misdeeds and to prevent further problems in the future.

episodes.title: Ep. 24 - The Wuhan Coverup
episodes.description: The Senator and Michael sit down to discuss a shocking new revelation about the Wuhan Institute of Virology and how to restart the American economy.
episodes.summary: The Senator and Michael sit down to discuss a shocking new revelation about the Wuhan Institute of Virology and how to restart the American economy.

episodes.title: Ep. 23 - Easter In Isolation
episodes.description: The Senator and Michael discuss the political and spiritual meaning of the strangest Easter in centuries.
episodes.summary: The Senator and Michael discuss the political and spiritual meaning of the strangest Easter in centuries.

episodes.title: Ep. 22 - Running On Empty
episodes.description: Senator Cruz and Michael sit down with energy expert Wil VanLoh to discuss the collapse of America’s oil and gas industry and what we can do about it.
episodes.summary: Senator Cruz and Michael sit down with energy expert Wil VanLoh to discuss the collapse of America’s oil and gas industry and what we can do about it.

episodes.title: Ep. 21 - How Do We Start The Economy Again?
episodes.description: Senator Cruz and Michael sit down from a safe distance to discuss the historic economic devastation brought on by coronavirus and what to do about 10 million job losses in just two weeks.
episodes.summary: Senator Cruz and Michael sit down from a safe distance to discuss the historic economic devastation brought on by coronavirus and what to do about 10 million job losses in just two weeks.

episodes.title: Ep. 20 - What’s Actually In The Senate Relief Bill
episodes.description:
Michael joins Senator Cruz from a safe social distance to break down what’s in the bill that passed today, why it took so long, and what the hell airplane emissions have to do with coronavirus.

Verdict is co-hosted by Senator Ted Cruz and Michael Knowles. To hear more of Michael, check out The Michael Knowles Show on Youtube, Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever you stream your favorite podcasts.
episodes.summary:
Michael joins Senator Cruz from a safe social distance to break down what’s in the bill that passed today, why it took so long, and what the hell airplane emissions have to do with coronavirus.

Verdict is co-hosted by Senator Ted Cruz and Michael Knowles. To hear more of Michael, check out The Michael Knowles Show on Youtube, Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever you stream your favorite podcasts.

episodes.title: Ep. 19 - An Expert’s Perspective On The Pandemic
episodes.description: Michael is caught in the jaws of LA’s lockdown but joins Senator Cruz and a special guest online. Senator Barrasso joins the show to offer a physician’s insights on the pandemic panic and what we can expect from Congress in the coming days.
episodes.summary: Michael is caught in the jaws of LA’s lockdown but joins Senator Cruz and a special guest online. Senator Barrasso joins the show to offer a physician’s insights on the pandemic panic and what we can expect from Congress in the coming days.

episodes.title: Ep. 18 - The Cost Of Coronavirus
episodes.description:
Senator Cruz and Michael satellite in from a safe social distance to break down the social, political, and economic costs of the Chinese coronavirus—and who should pay.

Verdict is co-hosted by Senator Ted Cruz and Michael Knowles. To hear more of Michael, check out The Michael Knowles Show on Youtube, Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever you stream your favorite podcasts.
episodes.summary:
Senator Cruz and Michael satellite in from a safe social distance to break down the social, political, and economic costs of the Chinese coronavirus—and who should pay.

Verdict is co-hosted by Senator Ted Cruz and Michael Knowles. To hear more of Michael, check out The Michael Knowles Show on Youtube, Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever you stream your favorite podcasts.

episodes.title: Ep. 17 - Cruz's Coronavirus Quarantine
episodes.description:
Senator Cruz self-quarantines after a run-in with coronavirus at CPAC, so Michael satellites in to get the latest on where the virus came from, how it's spreading, and what the government is doing to stop it.
Verdict is co-hosted by Senator Ted Cruz and Michael Knowles. To hear more of Michael, check out The Michael Knowles Show on Youtube, Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever you stream your favorite podcasts.

episodes.title: Ep. 16 - How Nigel Farage Won Brexit
episodes.description:
Nigel Farage joins Senator Ted Cruz and Michael Knowles to break down what led to the UK’s dramatic exit from the EU, discuss what Huawei's spy tech could mean for the Five Eyes relationship, and drop a few bombshells about the most important issue of our time, Megxit.

Verdict is co-hosted by Senator Ted Cruz and Michael Knowles. To hear more of Michael, check out The Michael Knowles Show on Youtube, Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever you stream your favorite podcasts.

episodes.title: Ep. 15 - A Firsthand Look at Socialism
episodes.description:
Senator Cruz’s tia joins the show to share her firsthand experience living under Castro-era socialism and they consider what an America under President Bernie Sanders would look like.

Verdict is co-hosted by Senator Ted Cruz and Michael Knowles. To hear more of Michael, check out The Michael Knowles Show on Youtube, Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever you stream your favorite podcasts.

episodes.title: Ep. 14 - Live at CPAC
episodes.description: Senator Ted Cruz and Michael Knowles discuss the major shift in the two parties that has led to so many conservative victories in recent years. Then, RNC Chairwoman Ronna McDaniel joins to discuss the party's 2020 strategy.
episodes.summary: Senator Ted Cruz and Michael Knowles discuss the major shift in the two parties that has led to so many conservative victories in recent years. Then, RNC Chairwoman Ronna McDaniel joins to discuss the party's 2020 strategy.

episodes.title: What's Next For Verdict?
episodes.description:
Michael and Senator Cruz discuss the future of VERDICT and announce a major upcoming live appearance.

Verdict is co-hosted by Senator Ted Cruz and Michael Knowles.
episodes.summary:
Michael and Senator Cruz discuss the future of VERDICT and announce a major upcoming live appearance.

episodes.title: Ep. 13 - The Stakes of 2020
episodes.description:
Senator Cruz and Michael examine the radical policies that could follow a Democratic victory in November.

Verdict is co-hosted by Senator Ted Cruz and Michael Knowles. To hear more of Michael, check out The Michael Knowles Show on Youtube, Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever you stream your favorite podcasts.

episodes.title: Ep. 12 - It All Comes Down To This
episodes.description:
The Senate votes on whether or not to remove the President, one Republican defects, and the stakes couldn’t be higher moving forward.
Verdict is co-hosted by Senator Ted Cruz and Michael Knowles. To hear more of Michael, check out The Michael Knowles Show on Youtube, Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever you stream your favorite podcasts.

episodes.title: Ep. 11 - Inside The State Of The Union
episodes.description: After the State of the Union, Senator Cruz gives an inside look at the Iowa disaster. We breakdown President Trump's speech, Rush Limbaugh is awarded the Medal of Freedom, and we cover what's coming in the final vote on impeachment. All that and more.
episodes.summary: After the State of the Union, Senator Cruz gives an inside look at the Iowa disaster. We breakdown President Trump's speech, Rush Limbaugh is awarded the Medal of Freedom, and we cover what's coming in the final vote on impeachment. All that and more.

episodes.title: Ep. 10 - It’s Not Over Yet
episodes.description:
Sen. Lindsey Graham stops by to walk us through how Mitch McConnell got 51 votes to stop further witnesses. But Senator Cruz knows a lot could happen between now and acquittal.
Verdict is co-hosted by Senator Ted Cruz and Michael Knowles. To hear more of Michael, check out The Michael Knowles Show on Youtube, Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever you stream your favorite podcasts.

episodes.title: Ep. 9 - A Day In The Life
episodes.description:
The Senate heads for a nail-biter. The Senator sits down in the daylight for a change to lay out his strategy before heading to Capitol Hill.
This show was co-hosted by Senator Ted Cruz and Michael Knowles. To hear more of Michael, check out The Michael Knowles Show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever you stream your favorite podcasts.

episodes.title: Ep. 8 - Four Crucial Questions
episodes.description:
President Trump weighs in on Senator Cruz’s impeachment performance, and the Senator tries to get even one straight answer out of Adam Schiff.
This show was co-hosted by Senator Ted Cruz and Michael Knowles. To hear more of Michael, check out The Michael Knowles Show on Apple Podcasts, Spotify, or wherever you stream your favorite podcasts.

episodes.title: Ep. 7 - The Deal of the Century
episodes.description: The arguments are over, Mitch McConnell doesn’t have the votes to end impeachment, and President Trump tries to bring peace to the Middle East.
episodes.summary: The arguments are over, Mitch McConnell doesn’t have the votes to end impeachment, and President Trump tries to bring peace to the Middle East.

episodes.title: Ep. 6 - The Bolton Bombshell
episodes.description: A leak from John Bolton’s leak throws impeachment into chaos, President Trump’s legal team comes out swinging, and Senator Cruz sends at least one reporter up a wall.
episodes.summary: A leak from John Bolton’s leak throws impeachment into chaos, President Trump’s legal team comes out swinging, and Senator Cruz sends at least one reporter up a wall.

episodes.title: Ep. 5 - Now It's Our Turn
episodes.description: The Trump team finally gets a chance to make their case against impeachment, Senator Cruz identifies the sneaky logical trick in Democrats' arguments, and four presidential candidates are stuck in the Capitol just nine days before the Iowa caucuses.
episodes.summary: The Trump team finally gets a chance to make their case against impeachment, Senator Cruz identifies the sneaky logical trick in Democrats' arguments, and four presidential candidates are stuck in the Capitol just nine days before the Iowa caucuses.

episodes.title: Ep. 4 - From ‘Roe’ To Impeachment
episodes.description: The Democrats wrap up their case against the President, the Trump team launches its arguments tomorrow, and we all march for life on the 47th anniversary of Roe v. Wade.
episodes.summary: The Democrats wrap up their case against the President, the Trump team launches its arguments tomorrow, and we all march for life on the 47th anniversary of Roe v. Wade.

episodes.title: Ep. 3 - Democrats Throw Biden Under The Bus
episodes.description: House Democrats open the door on the Bidens’ crooked dealings in Ukraine.
episodes.summary: House Democrats open the door on the Bidens’ crooked dealings in Ukraine.

episodes.title: Ep. 2 - Republicans' Secret Impeachment Weapon
episodes.description: Senator Cruz breaks down the arguments on impeachment and reveals Republicans’ secret weapon.
episodes.summary: Senator Cruz breaks down the arguments on impeachment and reveals Republicans’ secret weapon.

episodes.title: Ep. 1 - Trump On Trial
episodes.description: The first full day of President Trump’s impeachment trial comes to a close. Senator Cruz breaks down what the trial means for the White House, the Congress, and the country.
episodes.summary: The first full day of President Trump’s impeachment trial comes to a close. Senator Cruz breaks down what the trial means for the White House, the Congress, and the country.

episodes.title: Verdict with Ted Cruz: Trailer
episodes.description: Subscribe to listen to Verdict with Ted Cruz.
